mapper.select: SELECT entrepot_name,point_name,import_name,operator_name,import_time,state,sample_info_code FROM import_sample_info WHERE event_code=#{eventCode} ORDER BY import_time DESC

SELECT s.person_code,p.researchname AS person_name,s.code AS sample_code,s.type,s.capacity,s.cryopreserved_code,s.cryopreserved_line,s.cryopreserved_column,s.subpackage_time,s.offset_number,s.refrigerator_code,s.refrigerator_layer,s.sample_shelf,s.samplebox_code,s.box_place,s.head FROM sample s LEFT JOIN person p ON s.person_code=p.researchcode WHERE s.sample_info_code=#{sampleInfoCode}
